subject: Self Care
title: Withdrawal and Isolation
description: A 60-second lesson on Withdrawal and Isolation.

hook.text: He stopped joining lunch. Declined every invitation. Sat alone more and more. Withdrawal was burnout's quiet phase.

buildup.text: Burnout drains the social battery. Interactions that once energized become obligations that exhaust further.

discovery.text: Isolation feels protective but accelerates burnout. Social connection is a recovery tool â€” not an energy drain.

twist.text: The people who need connection most are the ones who withdraw most. Burnout hijacks the very behavior that could help.

climax.text: If you're pulling away from everyone, tell one trusted person. You don't need to explain everything. Just say you're struggling.

punchline.text: Isolation feels safe but worsens burnout. Reach out.

quiz.question: Why is withdrawal during burnout counterproductive?
options: Social connection is a recovery tool that burnout pushes you away from
Withdrawal has no effect on burnout
